# Zeyna Startup Agency Landing Page - Development Guide\n\nThis project is a modern React landing page for Zeyna, a premium digital agency. Built with React, Vite, GSAP animations, and optimized for performance and SEO.\n\n## Project Overview\n- **Framework**: React 19 + Vite\n- **Animations**: GSAP with ScrollTrigger\n- **Styling**: Modern CSS with custom properties\n- **SEO**: Complete meta tags, OpenGraph, JSON-LD\n- **Performance**: Optimized for speed and accessibility\n\n## Key Components\n1. Header - Sticky navigation with scroll effects\n2. Hero - Full-screen section with animated text and visuals\n3. Clients - Partner logos with hover effects\n4. About - Stats counters with GSAP animations\n5. Features - Service cards with premium styling\n6. Portfolio - Case study grid with image overlays\n7. Team - Member profiles with hover effects\n8. Testimonials - Interactive carousel\n9. Blog Preview - Article cards linking to blog posts\n10. BigCTA - Final call-to-action with gradient effects\n11. Footer - Complete contact and link information\n\n## Development Commands\n- `npm run dev` - Start development server\n- `npm run build` - Build for production\n- `npm run preview` - Preview production build\n\n## Design System\n- Colors: Dark theme with blue/cyan/purple accents\n- Typography: Inter font family with multiple weights\n- Animations: Smooth reveals, parallax, hover effects\n- Layout: CSS Grid and Flexbox for responsive design\n\n## Best Practices\n- Component-based architecture\n- Semantic HTML for SEO\n- Accessibility features (reduced motion support)\n- Performance optimizations\n- Mobile-first responsive design
